mapper.insert: insert into chas_yw_jhrwjl (id, isdel, data_flag, lrr_sfzh, lrsj, xgr_sfzh, xgsj, baqid, baqmc, jhrwbh, rwzt, jlsj, ryxm, rybh, sjbq) values (#{id,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{isdel,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{dataFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lrrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lrsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{xgrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xgsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{baqid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{baqmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jhrwbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rwzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jlsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ryxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{rybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjbq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update chas_yw_jhrwjl set ISDEL = #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DATA_FLAG = #{dataFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, LRR_SFZH = #{lrrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LRSJ = #{lrsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, XGR_SFZH = #{xgrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XGSJ = date_trunc('second', now()), baqid = #{baqid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, baqmc = #{baqmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jhrwbh = #{jhrwbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , rwzt = #{rwzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jlsj =#{jlsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ryxm = #{ryxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rybh = #{rybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select * from chas_yw_jhrwjl where isdel = 0 and ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from chas_yw_jhrwjl where isdel = 0 and rybh = #{rybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by lrsj asc

select * from chas_yw_jhrwjl
1=1 and isdel = 0
and ryxm like '%${ryxm}%'
and jhrwbh = '${jhrwbh}'
and rybh = '${rybh}'
and rwzt in
'${item}'
